short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This Chrome extension provides screen sharing functionality for use with the T-Metrics Webchat application.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This extension is for use alongside the T-Metrics OmniChannel Contact Center.  It allows for agents who receive WebRTC-based audio/video calls to share their screens with callers in realtime, giving the ability to share content and demonstrate concepts more clearly.

The extension is required for screen sharing when using the T-Metrics OmniChannel Contact Center's Webchat Application.
